sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-about', templateUrl: './about.component.html', styleUrls: ['./about.component.scss'] }) export class AboutComponent { }

About me

I am an enthusiastic and detail-oriented Junior Front-end Developer seeking an entry-level position. Interested in new technologies and working methods. I like to come up with ideas that to permit to improve business processes. I am looking for an innovative and user-centric company to best meet the needs of the customer, from his idea to the final delivery of his project, or participate in the improvement of a project existing.
